value.title: New Artificial Intelligence System Enables Machines That See the World More Like Humans Do
value.excerpt: A new “common-sense” approach to computer vision enables artificial intelligence that interprets scenes more accurately than other systems do. Computer vision systems sometimes make inferences about a scene that fly in the face of common sense.

value.title: Mercedes Beats Tesla to Hands-Free Driving
value.excerpt: Mercedes can sell its autonomous drive package, called Drive Pilot, to be used on parts of Germany’s Autobahn network at a max speed of 37 miles per hour.

value.title: AI is thriving on and driving the edge
value.excerpt: The edge is an ideal environment for AI largely because it's still in the greenfield stage of development and has been so widely distributed.

value.title: We now know what the self-driving Apple Car might look like
value.excerpt: Several rumors point to Apple possibly working on a self-driving car to one day rival Tesla. A British car leasing-company revealed what the car may look like.

value.title: How self-driving cars will 'talk' to pedestrians

value.title: Self-driving startup Robotics Research raises $228 mln in funding
value.excerpt: Self-driving technology startup Robotic Research said on Thursday it has raised $228 million from investors including SoftBank 9984.T to scale up its commercial division's solutions for trucks, buses and logistics vehicles.

value.title: Moderna Stock Is Sold by This Robot Trader. It Bought Tesla and Merck Instead.

value.title: Mumbai-based firm to launch AIoT-enabled driverless car next year. Details here
value.excerpt: Mumbai-based automobile-as-a-service company - Autonomous Intelligence Motors Private Limited (AIMPL) - on Wednesday announced that it will launch an artificial intelligence-of-things (AIoT) powered autonomous car in the country next year.

value.title: Ex-Tesla, Impossible Foods lawyer takes top legal job at robot farming startup
value.excerpt: Myra Pasek, who was the second in-house lawyer hired by Tesla Inc's Elon Musk and the first general counsel for Impossible Foods Inc, is taking on a new startup assignment, joining Silicon Valley-based robotic farming company Iron Ox Inc as general counsel.

value.title: Intel plans to take self-driving car unit Mobileye public
value.excerpt: Intel Corp said on Monday it plans to take self-driving-car unit Mobileye public in the United States in mid-2022, a deal which could value the Israeli unit at more than $50 billion, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters.

value.title: Here's what defines a self-driving car

value.title: 193 countries adopt 1st global agreement on Ethics of AI
value.excerpt: All member nations of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) adopted on Thursday a historical text that defines the common values and principles needed to ensure the healthy development of artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: 193 countries adopt the first global agreement on the Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is present in everyday life, from booking flights and applying for loans to steering driverless cars. It is also used in specialized fields such as cancer screening or to help create inclusive environments for the disabled.
